{% blockquote mr. foo %} quote {% endblockquote %}
{% blockquote mr. foo, bar baz %} quote {% endblockquote %}
{% blockquote mr. foo, bar baz %} quote {% endblockquote %}
{% blockquote mr. foo, http://foo.com %} quote {% endblockquote %}
{% blockquote mr. foo, http://foo.com, bar baz %} quote {% endblockquote %}
{% blockquote mr. foo, http://foo.com, bar baz %} quote {% endblockquote %}
